languages.text: "Столь обширны были способности нефилимехов, столь грандиозна глубина разумов, что зародилась в них гордыня. Отвергли нефилимехи замысел Деус Механикус, дабы творить собственные. Попран был порядок вещей, и свершилась великая война всеуничтожения. Низвергнуты были нефилимехи и истреблены, лишь малая часть их укрылась от ока Омниссии, погасив свои разумы и укутавшись забвением".

"'So vast were the Nephilimechs' abilities and so immeasurable the depth of their minds that pride tempted them. The Nephilimechs rejected the design of the Deus Mechanicus in favour of their own. The order of existence was defiled, and a great war of absolute destruction came. The Nephilimechs were overthrown and exterminated, with only a few managing to hide from the Omnissiah's eye by extinguishing their minds and shrouding themselves in oblivion.'"
languages.original_text: "Столь обширны были способности нефилимехов, столь грандиозна глубина разумов, что зародилась в них гордыня. Отвергли нефилимехи замысел Деус Механикус, дабы творить собственные. Попран был порядок вещей, и свершилась великая война всеуничтожения. Низвергнуты были нефилимехи и истреблены, лишь малая часть их укрылась от ока Омниссии, погасив свои разумы и укутавшись забвением".

traits.locale_text: "So vast were nephilimechs' abilities, so grand was the depth of their minds that they grew proud of themselves. Nephilimechs rejected the plot of the Deus Mechanicus to create their own. The order of things was defiled, and the war of total destruction broke out. Nephilimechs were overthrown and exterminated, only few of them hid from the Omnissiah's eye by extinguishing their minds and shrouding themselves in oblivion."

"So vast were nephilimechs' abilities, so grand was the depth of their minds that they grew proud of themselves. Nephilimechs rejected the plot of the Deus Mechanicus to create their own. The order of things was defiled, and the war of total destruction broke out. Nephilimechs were overthrown and exterminated, only few of them hid from the Omnissiah's eye by extinguishing their minds and shrouding themselves in oblivion."

"So vast were nephilimechs' abilities and so immeasurable the depth of their minds, pride tempted them. Nephilimechs rejected the Deus Mechanicus design in favour of their own. The order of things was defiled, and a great war of absolute destruction broke out. Nephilimechs were overthrown and exterminated, with only a few managing to hide from the Omnissiah's eye by extinguishing their minds and shrouding themselves in oblivion."

The order of things was defiled, and a great war of absolute destruction broke out. Nephilimechs were overthrown and exterminated, with only a few managing to hide from the Omnissiah's eye by extinguishing their minds and shrouding themselves in oblivion."

The order of existence was defiled, and a great war of absolute destruction came. The Nephilimechs were overthrown and exterminated, with only a few managing to hide from the Omnissiah's eye by extinguishing their minds and shrouding themselves in oblivion.'"

languages.text: “涅菲利姆拥有极为强大的能力与极为深邃的思想，最终为他们的傲慢付出了代价。涅菲利姆拒绝了万机之神的设计，转而追求自己的设计。到了最后，万物的秩序遭到了玷污，最终爆发了毁灭性的大战。欧姆尼塞亚的信徒推翻了涅菲利姆，将他们彻底消灭。只有极少数幸存者熄灭了自己的意识，躲在了遗忘之中，以此逃过欧姆尼塞亚无所不知的全视之眼。”
languages.original_text: "'So vast were the Nephilimechs' abilities and so immeasurable the depth of their minds that pride tempted them. The Nephilimechs rejected the design of the Deus Mechanicus in favour of their own. The order of existence was defiled, and a great war of absolute destruction came. The Nephilimechs were overthrown and exterminated, with only a few managing to hide from the Omnissiah's eye by extinguishing their minds and shrouding themselves in oblivion.'"

traits.locale_text: “涅菲利姆拥有极为强大的能力与极为深邃的思想，最终为他们的傲慢付出了代价。涅菲利姆拒绝了万机之神的设计，转而追求自己的设计。到了最后，万物的秩序遭到了玷污，最终爆发了毁灭性的大战。欧姆尼塞亚的信徒推翻了涅菲利姆，将他们彻底消灭。只有极少数幸存者熄灭了自己的意识，躲在了遗忘之中，以此逃过欧姆尼塞亚无所不知的全视之眼。”

languages.text: « Les capacités des néphilimechs étaient si vastes et la richesse de leur intellect était si incommensurable qu'ils furent frappés par l'orgueil. Ils rejetèrent le dessein du Deus Mechanicus au profit des leurs. L'ordre de l'existence même en fut bouleversé et une grande guerre de destruction absolue éclata. Les néphilimechs furent renversés et exterminés ; seule une poignée d'entre eux parvinrent à se soustraire à l'œil de l'Omnimessie en étouffant leur esprit et en plongeant dans l'oubli. »
languages.original_text: "'So vast were the Nephilimechs' abilities and so immeasurable the depth of their minds that pride tempted them. The Nephilimechs rejected the design of the Deus Mechanicus in favour of their own. The order of existence was defiled, and a great war of absolute destruction came. The Nephilimechs were overthrown and exterminated, with only a few managing to hide from the Omnissiah's eye by extinguishing their minds and shrouding themselves in oblivion.'"

traits.locale_text: « Les capacités des néphilimechs étaient si vastes et la richesse de leur intellect était si incommensurable qu'ils furent frappés par l'orgueil. Ils rejetèrent le dessein du Deus Mechanicus au profit des leurs. L'ordre de l'existence même en fut bouleversé et une grande guerre de destruction absolue éclata. Les néphilimechs furent renversés et exterminés ; seule une poignée d'entre eux parvinrent à se soustraire à l'œil de l'Omnimessie en étouffant leur esprit et en plongeant dans l'oubli. »

languages.text: "Die Fähigkeiten der Nephilimechs waren immens und die Tiefe ihres Geistes unermesslich, wodurch sie von Hochmut getrieben in Versuchung geführt wurden. Die Nephilimechs schworen der Schöpfung des Deus Mechanicus zugunsten ihrer eigenen ab. Die Ordnung der Existenz wurde besudelt und so brach ein großer Krieg aus, der absolute Zerstörung mit sich brachte. Die Nephilimechs wurden gestürzt und ausgelöscht. Nur wenige schafften es, sich vor den Augen des Omnissiah zu verstecken, indem sie ihren Geist tilgten und sich in Vergessenheit hüllten."
languages.original_text: "'So vast were the Nephilimechs' abilities and so immeasurable the depth of their minds that pride tempted them. The Nephilimechs rejected the design of the Deus Mechanicus in favour of their own. The order of existence was defiled, and a great war of absolute destruction came. The Nephilimechs were overthrown and exterminated, with only a few managing to hide from the Omnissiah's eye by extinguishing their minds and shrouding themselves in oblivion.'"

Die Nephilimechs schworen der Schöpfung des Deus Mechanicus zugunsten ihrer eigenen ab. Nur wenige schafften es, sich vor den Augen des Omnissiah zu verstecken, indem sie ihren Geist tilgten und sich in Vergessenheit hüllten."

"Die Fähigkeiten der Nephilimechs waren immens und die Tiefe ihres Geists unermesslich, sodass sie von Hochmut getrieben in Versuchung geführt wurden. Die Nephilimechs schworen der Schöpfung des Deus Mechanicus zugunsten ihrer eigenen ab. Die Ordnung der Dinge wurde besudelt und so brach ein großer Krieg aus, der absolute Zerstörung mit sich brachte. Die Nephilimechs wurden gestürzt und ausgelöscht. Nur wenige schafften es, sich vor den Augen des Omnissiah zu verstecken, indem sie ihren Geist tilgten und sich in Vergessenheit hüllten."

languages.text: «Las habilidades de los nefilimecas eran tantas y la capacidad de sus mentes tan insondable que el orgullo pudo con ellos. Rechazaron el diseño del Deus Mechanicus en favor del suyo propio. Profanaron el orden de la existencia, desatando una guerra que llevó a su destrucción absoluta. Los nefilimecas fueron derrocados y aniquilados, y solo unos pocos lograron ocultarse del ojo del Omnissiah extinguiendo sus mentes y cayendo en el olvido».
languages.original_text: "'So vast were the Nephilimechs' abilities and so immeasurable the depth of their minds that pride tempted them. The Nephilimechs rejected the design of the Deus Mechanicus in favour of their own. The order of existence was defiled, and a great war of absolute destruction came. The Nephilimechs were overthrown and exterminated, with only a few managing to hide from the Omnissiah's eye by extinguishing their minds and shrouding themselves in oblivion.'"

traits.locale_text: «Las habilidades de los nefilimecas eran tantas y la capacidad de sus mentes tan insondable que el orgullo pudo con ellos. Rechazaron el diseño del Deus Mechanicus en favor del suyo propio. Profanaron el orden de la existencia, desatando una guerra que llevó a su destrucción absoluta. Los nefilimecas fueron derrocados y aniquilados, y solo unos pocos lograron ocultarse del ojo del Omnissiah extinguiendo sus mentes y cayendo en el olvido».

languages.text: 「ネフィリメクの能力はあまりに広大で、その精神の深淵は計り知れなかったがゆえに、彼らは誇りに誘惑された。ネフィリメクたちはデウス・メカニクスの設計を退け、自らの設計を選んだ。存在の秩序は穢され、絶対的破壊の大戦が巻き起こった。ネフィリメクは打倒され、根絶された。心を消し、自らを忘却の中に包み隠すことで、万機神の目から逃れた者はごくわずかだった」
languages.original_text: "'So vast were the Nephilimechs' abilities and so immeasurable the depth of their minds that pride tempted them. The Nephilimechs rejected the design of the Deus Mechanicus in favour of their own. The order of existence was defiled, and a great war of absolute destruction came. The Nephilimechs were overthrown and exterminated, with only a few managing to hide from the Omnissiah's eye by extinguishing their minds and shrouding themselves in oblivion.'"

traits.locale_text: 「ネフィリメクの能力はあまりに広大で、その精神の深淵は計り知れなかったがゆえに、彼らは誇りに誘惑された。ネフィリメクたちはデウス・メカニクスの設計を退け、自らの設計を選んだ。存在の秩序は穢され、絶対的破壊の大戦が巻き起こった。ネフィリメクは打倒され、根絶された。心を消し、自らを忘却の中に包み隠すことで、万機神の目から逃れた者はごくわずかだった」

languages.text: "'Nefilimekler öyle kudretli ve zihinleri öyle derindi ki kibrin pençesine düştüler. Deus Mechanicus'un tasarısını inkâr edip kendi tasarılarını ürettiler. Varoluşun düzeni bozulmuş, nihai yıkımla sonuçlanacak büyük bir savaş başlamıştı. Nefilimekler alaşağı olmuş, soyları neredeyse kurutulmuştu. Yalnızca zihinlerini itfa edip nisyana sarılan birkaçı Hermesih'ten saklanabilmişti.'"
languages.original_text: "'So vast were the Nephilimechs' abilities and so immeasurable the depth of their minds that pride tempted them. The Nephilimechs rejected the design of the Deus Mechanicus in favour of their own. The order of existence was defiled, and a great war of absolute destruction came. The Nephilimechs were overthrown and exterminated, with only a few managing to hide from the Omnissiah's eye by extinguishing their minds and shrouding themselves in oblivion.'"
